about_the_game:
Call of Elyndra combines action RPG gameplay with cozy farm mechanics. You will take control of the hero who had a prophetic dream, telling them to leave their country and go to Elyndra. And there will be a lot of work to do - currying favor with the locals, tending to your farm, and saving more than just Elyndra from an upcoming invasion will be no easy tasks!

The story revolves around you becoming a part of the local community during a time when a war brews. You'll team up with 2 other Dreamers, traverse varied lands, repel an invasion, and uncover the truth about the surrounding world. While you may not have what it takes from the get-go, you will grow alongside your companions and the community. You will also grow tomatoes, cucumbers, and such, for you will be given a plot of land to farm and support the people of Elyndra. This means that you can play the game any way you want - you can do both farming and adventuring or focus entirely on either of those!

The game combines the best of titles like the old-school Zelda games with the likes of Stardew Valley while having its own style and identity. It's up to you how you will experience the world of Elyndra and how you will save it from the grasp of evil forces!

Plant vegetables, tend to livestock, fish, craft tools and furniture in your new homeland! It's the most relaxing way to work your way into becoming a valuable part of the local community.

Swing your sword and lay over 70 types of enemies in various dungeons. Real-time combat with customizable elements and powerful artifacts will let you fight the way that suits you the most.

Build relationships with villagers from four different realms. Each ally has powerups for farming. You can also call for their aid in combat!

Embark on quests and solve classic top-down, dungeon puzzles to uncover the long-forgotten history of these lands. There's more to this world than what you can see at first...

Befriend and face the adversities alongside Ariadne and Kaelan - two vagabonds lured to Elyndra by the exact same dream you had. See them grow and change over time as characters, fellow combatants, and valuable farmhands. Everyone has a story to tell... And write.

Elyndra is just a starting point of your journey. Visit dense forests, snowy mountain peaks, and marshlands to encounter new tribes - all with their own identities, dreams, and problems. It will be your duty to help them in their very own habitats. There will also be other locations, just as important, for you to traverse!

Contrary to most farming games, Call of Elyndra has an expansive story that will focus on becoming a part of your new community, tackling big and small problems, and fighting in an unjust war... And there's plenty more to uncover.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Grow crops, battle monsters, and unearth ancient secrets across diverse biomes as a hired hand in the village of Elyndra. Play as you want--cozy or action-driven--in Elyndra, where farming meets fantasy.
